titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 36) to amend title 18, United States Code, to protect pain-capable unborn children, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 36) to amend title 18, United States Code, to protect pain-capable unborn children, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-338, by Ms. Cheney.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 36 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 89.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 548.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 184 (Roll no. 546).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 187 (Roll no. 547).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 36) to amend title 18, United States Code, to protect pain-capable unborn children.
